title: No more output loglines on SIGINT/SIGABRT
body:
#### System information

git_branch=devel git_tag=v2021.09.03-26-g5da7fb64b git_commit=5da7fb64bf47f0b75a45a6f7b8ec3247768b78bb

OS & Version: Windows (but also reported to happen on Linux

#### Expected behaviour

On intercepting SIGINT (CTR+C) Erigon used to print out signal interception plus all messages about closing network connections and databases up to a clean shutdown.  Eventually (on multiple CTRL+C) a message appeared to inform that at 10Th signal interception the program would panic

#### Actual behaviour

Since `git_branch=devel git_tag=v2021.08.04-75-g4bd8721d4 git_commit=4bd8721d4924c51bb3c7343e213b2ec6d7466fbb` we've lost this behavior. Now on CTRl+C the program seems to silently abort (seems only a lack of printouts though as the db is cleanly closed apparently).
